p: Data for Figures 2 and 3A,B are available as a supplementary file (Table S1). Collection of next-generation sequencing (NGS) data related to this publication is under BioProject PRJNA590388. The link for the repository that includes the computational analysis is https://github.com/lylamha/influenza_sc. Corresponding files for the analysis ( Tables S2â€“S5) are available as supplementary files.
